thread.title: Ash
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Ash

author: Ash
title: Ash
text: I ordered a Flowermate v5.os. I chose the longest shipping. I put the order in on Friday and I received my package on Monday! I was pleasantly surprised at how fast the order came. Also, I talked to an online representative on the day I ordered and they were very helpful no matter how many questions that I had. I am also pleased with my product. It's a different high than backwoods but still amazing. It doesn't hurt my throat or my lungs, helps my asthma, and the battery life is great.
